name: The battle of the Rebels
description:
2D Shooter Project

It's called The battle of the Rebels!

I've made the following changes -

1. Revamped menu

2. New sprite for the player ( Luke Skywalker's X- wing model)

3. Added large ships as enemies

4. Added objective text for each level

5. Added new soundtrack for main menu and levels

The plot is to destroy the death star using the x wing!!
